info.title: LAU IdAM Back-End API
info.description: Log and Audit IdAM Back-End API, used for auditing IdAM logons.

tags.name: IdAM logon database operations.
tags.description: This is the Log and Audit Back-End API that will audit IdAM logons. The API will be invoked by IdAM service.

tags.name: User deletion operations
tags.description: This is the Log and Audit Back-End API that will audit user account deletions. The API will be invoked by IdAM service.

get.description: This operation will query and return a list of logins based on the search conditions provided in the URL path.

200.description: Request executed successfully. Response contains of logon logs

400.description: Missing userId, emailAddress, startTimestamp or endTimestamp parameters.

post.description: This operation will persist IdAM logons entries which are posted in the request. Single IdAM LogonAudit per request will be stored in the database.

201.description: Created logonLog response - includes id from DB.

get.description: Query deleted user accounts based on search conditions provided via URL params

400.description: Missing required parameter(s). startTimestamp and endStamp are both required and at least one of userId, emailAddress, firstName or lastName

200.description: Request executed successfully. Response will contain list of deletion logs

post.description: This operation will persist IdAM user deletion entries which are posted in the request. Single IdAM UserDeletionAudit per request will be stored in the database.

201.description: Created userDeletionAudit response - includes id from DB.

userId.description: The user on whose behalf the logon took place

emailAddress.description: The email address of the logon user

service.description: The service the logon user is accessing

ipAddress.description: The client ip address of the logon user

timestamp.description: When the operation took place with microseconds in iso-8601-date-and-time-format

LogonLog.description: Data model for the IdAM logon request

userId.description: IdAM ID of the deleted user.

emailAddress.description: Email address/username of the deleted user.

deletionTimestamp.description: When the operation took place with microseconds in iso-8601-date-and-time-format.

DeletionLog.description: Data model for the IdAM user deletion request

startRecordNumber.description: The index of the first record out of the full result set provided in the result set

moreRecords.description: Indicates whether there are more records beyond the current page in the full result set

totalNumberOfRecords.description: The total number of records in the full result set
